mathematica: RecurrenceTable[{a[0] == 3, a[1] == 7, a[n] == Floor[a[n - 1]^2/a[n - 2]]}, a, {n, 0, 40}] (* _Bruno Berselli_, Feb 04 2016 *)
prog: (MAGMA) Iv:=[3,7]; [n le 2 select Iv[n] else Floor(Self(n-1)^2/Self(n-2)): n in [1..40]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Feb 04 2016
crossrefs: See A008776 for definitions of Pisot sequences.
author: _David W. Wilson_
